alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN POLK COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Four Corners to near Auburndale. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Haines City, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Jan Phyl Village, Poinciana, Lake Alfred, Dundee, Davenport, Eagle Lake, Polk City, Lake Hamilton, Inwood, Cypress Gardens, Winter Haven Airport, Waverly, Loughman, and Wahneta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
